post:
First of all, I would like to wish you and your family a happy new year.

MyRSK webhosting solutions has entered the vps market well over a year now (globally). However, we have been providing web hosting solutions since 2009 locally - in Dubai for young entrepreneurs and startup companies.

We are currently holding strong with many, many happy clients

Today, and for the first time ever, we are advertising our Managed KVM Plans.

Deals
You may select one of these options

  • You can use "my20off" on checkout to reduce the price of the VPS by 20% for lifetime of your account.
  • Order the VPS (M1024 or M2048) with default pricing and receive cPanel license for FREE.

FREE Offsite FTP Account with 50GB of space
